title: My Childhood Friend Loathed Me, So I Decided To Stop Living In The Shadows And Hide - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Character Growth   Childhood Friends   Discrimination   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Hated Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Introverted Protagonist   Loneliness   Male Protagonist
author: Nora Usagi (Usako)   野良うさぎ(うさこ)
description:
I loved my childhood friend, but gave up on my bottled-up feelings for ten years so she’d be happy… I’m not the one she loves, after all.

All I want is a peaceful life with a few precious friends… So why are you getting close to me now? You loathe me, don’t you?

This is a story about unrequited love, romance, and the quarrels that plague them.>
